column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////About the pizza itself
column2: I was not impressed either. I've had Giordano's and Pizano's before
column3: and I enjoyed both of them so I was expecting this one to be even better. But this pizza was just so average in comparison. First
column4: it was lukewarm when it came out. Second
column5: it didn't even look that thick. The flavor was fine
